We\'ll send you a temporary login code. We\'ve sent a temporary login code. Please check your inbox or spam folder. Enter code here Didn\'t receive it? Generate a new code FINISH Generating new code… This code is valid for 30 minutes. This code has expired. Generate a new one! Wrong code! Please try again. Insert your code. We\'ve got news! We\'re working on it! Our users\' security is our top one priority, and that\'s why we\'re developing a new login system using your email address. At the moment, you can only access to Aptoide using social media accounts. We\'re working hard for email login to come back soon, so stay tuned! Check our blog Our users\' security is our top one priority, so login to Aptoide Uploader is temporarily unavailable while we work to make some changes on it. We\'ll be quick! We\'re working hard for it to be back soon, so stay tuned! Connect with Facebook Connect with Google
